doc.title: Ultimate Hawker Fest is here!
doc.text: After/IN 3/CD months/NNS of/IN planning/VBG ,/, the/DT Ultimate/NNP Hawker/NNP Fest/NNP is/VBZ finally/RB upon/IN us/PRP$ !!/NN Today/NN ,/, all/RB the/DT hawkers/NNS will/VB be/VB going/VBG down/NN to/TO Millenia/VB Walk/NN to/TO set/NN up/IN their/PRP$ stalls/NNS ./. They/PRP have/VBP all/RB been/VBN working/VBG very/RB hard/JJ to/TO come/VB up/RP with/IN the/DT Ultimate/NNP versions/NN of/IN their/PRP$ dishes/NNS and/CC now/RB what/WP remains/VBZ is/VBZ for/IN YOU/NN to/TO be/VB the/DT judge/NN !/. How/WRB tok/NNP kong/NNP can/MD Hokkien/NNP Mee/NNP get/VB ?/. Does/NNP Beef/NNP Kway/NNP Teow/NNP taste/NN better/NN with/IN Wagyu/NN Beef/NN ?/. Will/NNP Chef/NNP William/NNP Soh/NNP 's/POS heritage/NN carrot/NN cake/NN measure/NN up/NN ?/. Each/DT sheet/NN of/IN coupons/NN is/VBZ worth/JJ $/$ 50/CD and/CC there/RB is/VBZ no/RB entrance/JJ fee/NN ./.
